# hypR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Use hypR to work practically with hypergraphs in R. hypR allows the user to create a hypergraph object, which can be manipulated and have calculations performed upon it.

## Installation

The development version of hypR is available from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hwarden162/hypR")
```
